net.uniform.impl

Class AbstractSingleElementDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.uniform.impl.AbstractDecorator
      • net.uniform.impl.AbstractSingleElementDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Decorator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElementErrorsDecorator, LabelDecorator

    public abstract class AbstractSingleElementDecorator
extends AbstractDecorator
    Abstract decorator implementation that contains all generic logic that any decorator only appliable to a single element should have.
    Author:
    Eduardo Ramos

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public List<SimpleHTMLTag> render(Form form,
                                  List<Element> elements,
                                  List<SimpleHTMLTag> rendered)
        Description copied from interface: Decorator
        Decorate the previously generated HTML.
        Parameters:
        form - Form of the element, might be null
        elements - List of elements being decorated. It will be a list of 1 element for an decorator applied to a single element.
        rendered - Rendered HTML so far
        Returns:
        Decorated HTML

      • render

        protected abstract List<SimpleHTMLTag> render(Element element,
